mugs.name: Classic White Ceramic Mug
mugs.description: The timeless Starbucks classic white ceramic mug. Features the iconic Starbucks siren logo and holds 11 oz of your favorite beverage. Dishwasher safe.

mugs.name: Pike Place Roast Mug
mugs.description: Inspired by the original Pike Place Market store in Seattle. This 12 oz mug celebrates Starbucks' roots with a vintage-style illustration. Microwave safe.

mugs.name: Holiday Season Tumbler
mugs.description: Limited edition holiday mug featuring festive red designs and snowflake patterns. Double-wall insulated to keep drinks warm longer. Holds 16 oz.

mugs.name: City Collection: Seattle
mugs.description: Part of the exclusive Starbucks City Collection. This Seattle mug showcases the Space Needle and downtown skyline. A must-have for travelers and collectors. 14 oz capacity.

mugs.name: Reserve Roastery Mug
mugs.description: Premium matte black mug from the Starbucks Reserve Roastery line. Features copper accent detailing and the Reserve logo. Perfect for specialty coffee enthusiasts. 12 oz.

mugs.name: You Are Here Collection
mugs.description: The beloved You Are Here series captures iconic landmarks and cultural elements from around the world. Each mug tells a unique story. 14 oz, ceramic with colorful glaze.
